          <title>
            <string language="en">Activities that affect the amount of carbon dioxide or methane in the atmosphere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aktivitäten, die die Menge des Kohlendioxyds

            <string language="en">These illustrations shows some activities that affect the amount of carbon dioxide or methane in the atmosphere.</string>
